review: I like the Fire TV Stick. User interface is easy to use, and there are a lot of shows that are included with Prime membership. I am slightly annoyed that all the movies or shows my kid wants to watch are for rent for at least 3.99. This is certainly not Amazon's fault, but it somewhat defeats the purpose of Prime.Will continue to use The Fire TV Stick and aside from my kids choice in (Premium) shows, love the product.
author: fwwalker "fwwalker"

review: Works great. A lot of varieties of shows/movies. It does not reach signal  if it  far from the router so only can use it on tvs closest to router. I wish it could get a better signal.
